text:
nama#stE rudra maqnyava# uqtOtaq iSha#vEq nama#H | 
nama#stE astuq dhanva#nE bAqhuByA#muqta tEq nama#H || 					
yA taq iShu#H Siqvata#mA SiqvaM baqBUva# tEq dhanu#H | 
SiqvA Sa#raqvyA# yA tavaq tayA# nO rudra mRuDaya || 					
yA tE# rudra SiqvA taqnUraGOqrA &pA#pakASinI | 
tayA# nastaqnuvAq Santa#mayAq giri#SantAqBi cA#kaSIhi || 				
yAmiShu#M giriSantaq hastEq - [  ] 1
